title: Security of all judges tightened: PM’s Office
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Prime Minister’s Office states that the security of all Judges around the island have been tightened following concerns brought to light regarding the security detail of Kaduwela Magistrate being removed.
Alarmed by the violent and intimidatory tactics used to crush dissent: CPA
Red alert issued for likely cyclonic storm over Bay of Bengal
